title: Oracle | IC3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience: 3.5 Years
Prior Experience: Unicorn Startup
Date of the Offer: Oct 2024
Company: Oracle 
Title/Level: IC3
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 37,00,000 INR
Relocation/Signing Bonus: Reimbursement upto 3L INR
Stock bonus: 45,000 USD equally vested over 4 years
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 37L + 12L = 49,00,000 INR
